content: The stock market is indeed closed today. Happy 4th of July!
This is so cool — exercising with Immersive Virtual Reality (IVR) can have the same effects as physical exercise! Who says video games aren’t good for you?
Warning: Be careful if you’re shopping on TikTok!
Prime Day on @amazon is here! If you’re looking for great tech deals, don’t miss out. What devices have you been eyeing?

The world paid respect to Shinzo Abe, Japan's longest-serving prime minister today. Truly unthinkable loss for the country — he will be sorely missed.
https://cnn.com/2022/07/12/asia/shinzo-abe-funeral-japan-tuesday-intl-hnk/index.html…
Crypto winter isn’t stopping GameStop! They’re moving forward with a “public beta” marketplace for NFTs. Are you ready to dive deeper into the NFT world?
Let’s go from NYC to upstate #LakeLife ….Hold on tight!
June data shows inflation continuing to rise, reaching a 4-DECADE peak at 9.1%!!! Think there’s any signs of slowing down? Let’s hope so!

Twitter and Elon continue to battle it out! Who thinks we’ll see this play out in court?
https://cnn.com/2022/07/12/tech/twitter-elon-musk-acquisition-lawsuit/index.html…
Technology being used for the greater good!! @WaymapOrg is making it easier to navigate transit systems for the bllind and visually impaired. It’s available in Washington, DC - which city is next??
Who’s watching the Open Championship!? Round 1 started today in St. Andrews, Scotland. Rooting for anyone?
Huge News! Prime Day may be over but @amazon has huge initiatives on the horizon. In collaboration with Fred Hutchinson Research Center, they’ll be testing clinical trials for an anti-cancer vaccine!
No, you can’t download music (illegally) again, but you can purchase music NFTs. LimeWire is back! Remember them? Still TBD if NFTs will stop downloading halfway through!
How did you start your day? #CoffeeOnTheLake was my start and it was great!! #FridayFeeling #HappyFriday
Polio is back?? Let’s hope not - before this week, there hadn't been a case since 1979!
With melting roads and traffic stops, the UK is the hottest it’s EVER been. I can’t believe how intense this heat is getting!!
Wake up at Lake, coffee on Lake, then get on the Lake, then Jump in Lake to cool off! #HotHotHot #GoJumpInALake
These classics shouldn’t be touched! Ever had a favorite movie get ruined by a remake?
True-crime lovers! Who’s been watching ‘Mind over Murder’? Spoiler alert if you click!
Anything to stay cool, I guess! Would you try watermelon pizza?
Almost back to school already?! Any must-have items on your list this year? Asking for a friend …

TEACHERS! I am SO EXCITED to announce that #JohnClearMyList is back! Throughout August, I’ll be clearing the school supply lists of hard-working educators across the U.S. Rules to enter in the thread!
Thousands are being forced to evacuate Mariposa County, California due to an uncontrolled wildfire! Praying for everyone’s safety!
Monkeypox is officially a global health concern!! How are you taking precautions?
I bet you can’t get through this article without smiling! Let’s continue to have a good week!

We're halfway through the first week of #JohnClearMyList!!! Congratulations @MrsBietler - 1st Grade Teacher in Detroit, Michigan - and @TreeAXO - High School English Teacher in Lewisville, NC. Your lists are getting cleared today!
Tiffany Blue NFTs? The jeweler teamed up with CryptoPunks to launch “NFTiff”, turning your NFT into a bespoke pendant. Not sure if I should let my daughters see this!
Gas prices may be lower, but drivers are staying off the road now even more than they were at the beginning of the pandemic! How are you getting around these days?
Uh oh, spending all this time talking about schools is bringing me back to my @LEGO_Group days! How do I look??

It’s that time!!! I am clearing more school supply lists today for #JohnClearMyList! Congratulations @BrittanyE_Burke - High School American Sign Language Teacher in Fairfax, Virginia - and @Mrs_FKDreher - 3rd Grade STEMS teacher in Columbia, South Carolina.
TicketTok? @TicketMaster and @tiktok partner up to allow users to purchase concert tickets through videos on the app! Going to any shows soon?
A #ThrowbackThursday for sure! Remember these discontinued gems? Any other favorites missing from this list?

Federal charges have now been filed against the officers in Breonna Taylor’s death! Happy to see this step towards justice. 
https://cnn.com/2022/08/04/us/breonna-taylor-federal-charges/index.html…

Traveling soon? These stories will make you think twice before you book your next stay!
#JohnClearMyList Week 1 Recap!

We’ve reached the end of Week 2 for #JohnClearMyList! Let’s clear more lists! @midstar01, 4th-5th Grade Teacher in Portland, Oregan, and @BoedeckerKellie, Principal in Helena, Montana. Congratulations - I’m clearing your lists!
What’s your #FridayFeeling?? Drop an emoji below!

Hi all, it’s come to my attention there are accounts impersonating me and my team. Official #JohnClearMyList winners will be announced on my verified accounts ONLY. Please assist by reporting any other accounts acting on my behalf.
Hi @ArochoMarisol, thank you for sending your list for #JohnClearMyList! Please know that winners are only being contacted through my verified personal account.
Hey @ThomasaniaC - thank you for sending your list for #JohnClearMyList! Please know that winners are only being contacted through my verified personal account.
Hi @TeacherAnderson - thank you for sending your list for #JohnClearMyList! Please know that winners are only being contacted through my verified personal account.

From streaming to social media and now ride shares? Ads are back and they’re everywhere. Don’t be surprised on your next @Uber or @lyft ride.
Went for a 2 hour run today and every 15 minutes , I looked behind me and this ambulance was there… I didn’t think I looked that bad :))) #LongRun #StopFollowingMe #imStillMoving
